text: The radical left wants to destroy everything our great nation stands for. True patriots must stand up and fight back before it's too late!
Scientists agree that climate change is real. The data clearly shows rising temperatures over the past century.
You're either with us or against us. There is no middle ground when our freedom is at stake.
Millions of citizens are demanding change. Join the movement and make your voice heard!
The corrupt politicians have been lying to you for years. Can we really trust anything they say?
This is the worst economic crisis in the history of our nation. Complete and total disaster!
Dr. Smith, a leading expert at Harvard University, says this policy will work. Who are we to question such authority?
The new transportation bill allocates $50 billion for infrastructure improvements over the next five years.
They criticize us for X, but what about when they did Y? It's always rules for thee but not for me.
Make America Great Again! Build the Wall! America First!
Immigration is the sole reason for all our economic problems. Stop the invasion and watch prosperity return.
The crooked media, the fake news networks, the lying journalists - they're all part of the same corrupt system.
